climatePledgeFriendly.details: Cradle to Cradle Certified products are made with safer materials and responsible processes to positively impact people and our planet. SILVER ACHIEVEMENT LEVEL

features: ALL-IN-1 Cleanser To hydrate and Rrefresh skin: This all-in-1 micellar cleansing water is a facial cleanser and makeup remover that is gentle on skin. This micellar water for all skin types gently cleanses, removes makeup, dirt and oils from skin.

A soothing formula that gently cleanses: micellar water leaves skin feeling/looking healthy and hydrated; formulated to be gentle on even the most sensitive skin; easily removes makeup without over-drying skin.

A multi-purpose cleanser powered by micelle technology: Micelles work like a magnet to gently cleanse, while removing makeup, dirt, sunscreen, and excess oil all in 1 step; No rinsing, no harsh rubbing- just clean, refreshed skin.

Dermatolgist and Ophthalmologist tested for safety: safe for use on face, lips and eye area. Approved by Cruelty-Free International under the Leaping Bunny Program. Vegan formula is oil-free, paraben-free, fragrance-free, sulfate-free and silicone free.
America's #1 Micellar Water Brand: there's a reason one bottle is sold every 3 seconds!* *Source: Nielsen Measured Mass Market, Full Year 2022, Unit Sales
body.description: This All-in-1 Micellar Cleansing Water is surprisingly powerful yet gentle to skin. It effectively removes makeup, cleanses and refreshes skin. A multi-purpose cleanser that contains Micellar technology. Like a magnet, micelles capture and lift away dirt, oil and makeup without harsh rubbing, leaving skin perfectly clean, hydrated and refreshed without over-drying. • All-in-1 cleanser and makeup remover cleanses, removes makeup and refreshes skin • Oil-Free, Alcohol-Free, Fragrance-Free • Micelle Technology attracts dirt, oil and makeup like a magnet without harsh rubbing • All skin types, even sensitive TO REMOVE EYE MAKEUP: Hold pad over closed eyes for a few seconds, then gently wipe without harsh rubbing. TO CLEAN SKIN & REMOVE FACE MAKEUP: Gently wipe all over until skin is completely clean from makeup and impurities. Use daily, AM/PM. No need to rinse. Avoid contact with eyes. If contact occurs, rinse thoroughly with water.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Garnier SkinActive Micellar Water for All Skin Types, Facial Cleanser & Makeup Remover
reviews.reviewText: Garnier SkinActive Micellar Water is a game-changer for skincare. This bottle caters to all skin types, offering a refreshing cleanse without drying or causing irritation. The micellar technology effortlessly removes makeup, dirt, and oil, even waterproof mascara. The no-rinse formula is a time-saving delight, making it perfect for busy routines. The practical packaging and hypoallergenic, fragrance-free formula make this micellar water a must-have. It's a reliable and efficient skincare solution that leaves your skin feeling clean and refreshed. Highly recommended!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars 10/10 will buy again!
reviews.reviewText: I am honestly shocked that this works so well! Zero residue, doesn’t dry out my skin. (I use mainly for mascara/eyeliner removal.) A little bit goes a long way, with no need to rinse. It removes makeup quicker and more thoroughly than anything else I’ve tried.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Used daily for years. Does the job!
reviews.reviewText: I got on the micellar water bandwagon about 10 years ago, and use it daily to remove makeup.I’m 64, with sensitive skin. I find this product gentle and effective in removing makeup. I don’t use waterproof mascara so I can’t speak to how well it works for that.I’m happy with this Garnier product. Over the years, I’ve tried a couple of different brands, but always come back to Garnier.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This is a game changer!
reviews.reviewText: I've struggled to find the perfect makeup remover for a while, but I've finally found one that exceeded my expectations. This makeup remover is an absolute game-changer. One of the standout features of this remover is its ability to remove eye makeup thoroughly. It effortlessly wipes away mascara, eyeshadow, and even stubborn waterproof eyeliner without any tugging or scrubbing. I've tried countless other removers, but none have been as effective at gently and quickly removing eye makeup like this one.Another benefit of this remover is how thoroughly it cleanses the skin. Even after a long day of wearing heavy makeup, this remover effortlessly lifts away every trace of foundation, concealer, and bronzer. As a result, my skin feels clean, fresh, soft, and rejuvenated.What sets this makeup remover apart from others is the impact it has had on my skin. Since I started using this remover, my complexion has noticeably improved. I've seen a reduction in breakouts and my skin looks healthier overall. As a busy mom of three, it's also a huge time saver! I can remove my makeup and cleanse my skin in one step.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Effective Makeup Remover Tool
reviews.reviewText: Micellar water has the consistency of water, and the opening is just a little bit too big, so you might squirt out more than needed until you get the hang of it. It works though, removing makeup with a few swipes. It's gentle on the skin and tingled only a bit without much irritation. The scent isn't bad, and I'd rate the moisturizing ability medium. It's only very, very slightly sticky after being air-dried.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars No Greasy Residue!
reviews.reviewText: I was very reluctant to try this particular makeup remover because I’ve been using the Klorane Micellar Water for years and absolutely love it. This, however, has proven to be just as effective in removing dirt, excess oil, and makeup without drying or irritating my skin. I’d like to think I have sensitive skin, especially around my nose and eyes but have no issue using this cleanser. I love that it doesn’t leave any residue after each use; and when I’ve gotten it in my eyes it’s not at all irritating, nor did it sting. I give this an A++ and highly recommend it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I love this product! Leaves skin soft and smooth. Gets makeup off my face and neck area. Has no odor either just like water as advertised! A little goes a long way. I use cotton balls as I don’t have the pad that goes with it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for removing make-up!
reviews.reviewText: I got this product to use as a make-up remover, and it certainly gets the job done! Just a small amount on a cotton pad seems to take make-up off effortlessly. I use it for both eye makeup and face makeup. I've been using this product regularly for over a month now, and barely seemed to put a dent in it. Seems to be great quality at a great price! No complaints here!

Love this for removing excess makeup after I wash my face. It works great and it is gentle. I have sensitive skin and eyes and this does not irritate them when I use it on a cotton pad. Good for the price

reviews.reviewTitle: must have for make up removal
reviews.reviewText: nice and gentle on the skin, removes makeup easily

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The size advertised is different from what was delivered! Same product but very little bottle lol

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Great for travelling - my wife finds it difficult to find this size of bottle in the shops , even at airports .

Me encantó, ahora es mi favorita. Es mucho mejor que el agua de Bioderma y además mucho más barata. Deja limpia la piel y lo mas importante es la sensación de limpieza que deja, no se siente grasosa ni nada. Con otras aguas Micellar siempre terminaba por enjuagar mi rostro porque no me gustaba la sensación que me quedaba en el rostro.Esta de Garnier es una ganadora. Relación precio calidad, excelente.
